医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
全球学龄前儿童饮食习惯分级规模揭晓香港研究人员开发的国际健康饮食报告卡量表（IHERCS）有效评估了不同文化背景下学龄前儿童的饮食行为和家庭食物环境，展示了其在全球健康促进工作中的实用性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Global-scale-to-grade-preschoolers-eating-habits-unveiled.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Global-scale-to-grade-preschoolers-eating-habits-unveiled.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72c2fc79-d566-454a-b7f3-0dd35ccee133 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 19:31:00 -0400 Global scale to grade preschoolers' eating habits unveiled
研究揭示了改善和加速肌肉损伤恢复的新策略肌肉损伤在活跃人群中很常见，这导致大多数运动员离开体育界。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Study-reveals-new-strategy-to-improve-and-accelerate-recovery-from-muscle-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Study-reveals-new-strategy-to-improve-and-accelerate-recovery-from-muscle-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e72b276-9c0a-41f7-8428-1d8294f040d4 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 15:46:00 -0400 Study reveals new strategy to improve and accelerate recovery from muscle injuries
研究揭示了CVD与妊娠期高血压疾病之间的关系布鲁塞尔大学的研究揭示了 CVD 与妊娠期高血压疾病之间的关系，但并非适用于所有人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Study-sheds-new-light-on-how-CVD-is-linked-with-hypertential-disorders-of-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Study-sheds-new-light-on-how-CVD-is-linked-with-hypertential-disorders-of-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3da34a1b-d37f-4292-bcab-36efd7c5e8b7 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 15:42:00 -0400 Study sheds new light on how CVD is associated with hypertensive disorders of pregnancy
研究表明，微重力严重扰乱人类基因表达的节律萨里大学的一项新研究表明，连续 60 天卧床休息所产生的模拟微重力效应会严重扰乱人类基因表达的节律。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Microgravity-severely-disrupts-rhythmic-gene-expression-in- humans-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Microgravity-severely-disrupts-rhythmic-gene-express-in- humans-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45857d54-727d-4652-8f5f-2ea6635139da Tue, 19 Mar 2024 15:39:00 -0400 Microgravity severely disrupts rhythmic gene expression in humans, study shows
新加坡国立大学研究揭示复发性急性髓系白血病耐药背后的关键机制新加坡国立大学 (NUS) 的科学家发现，细胞凋亡的逃避是复发性急性髓性白血病 (AML)（一种侵袭性血癌）患者耐药性的关键驱动因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/NUS-study-reveals-key-mechanisms-behind-drug-resistance-in-relapsed-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/NUS-study-reveals-key-mechanisms-behind-drug-resistance-in-relapsed-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce050a19-d786-4563-8969-25396c5bae2f Tue, 19 Mar 2024 15:35:00 -0400 NUS study reveals key mechanisms behind drug resistance in relapsed acute myeloid leukemia
解码大脑结构和我们意识之间的神秘联系想象一下，一艘外星飞船降落在地球上，这是一个前所未有的神秘实体。现在，将我们的大脑想象成一艘复杂的宇宙飞船，COST 行动意识神经架构 (NeuralArchCon) 的研究人员作为杰出的工程师决心破解其内部运作方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Decoding-the-cryptic-connection- Between-the-brains-architecture-and-our-thought.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Decoding-the-cryptic-connection- Between-the-brains-architecture-and-our-thought.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19ecdb64-4bd9-4fc4-ad45-e369c409228a Tue, 19 Mar 2024 15:18:00 -0400 Decoding the cryptic connection between the brain's architecture and our consciousness
当前 SARS-CoV-2 变体的严重程度与突变数量无关北卡罗来纳大学夏洛特分校预测健康和环境风险的计算智能中心 (CIPHER) 的新研究发现，导致 COVID-19 的两种最流行的病毒株：SARS-CoV-2 变种 BA.2.86 和 JN.1 是尽管与之前的变种相比，其突变数量较多，但在逃避免疫反应和引起感染方面，它们并不比其前身 Omicron 明显好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Severity-of-current-SARS-CoV-2-variants-is-not-linked-to-the-number-of-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Severity-of-current-SARS-CoV-2-variants-is-not-linked-to-the-number-of-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99632509-44be-4daa-af74-e6881a31ac4f Tue, 19 Mar 2024 15:16:15 -0400 Severity of current SARS-CoV-2 variants is not linked to the number of mutations
利用 UNI 和 CONCH 基础模型推进计算病理学基础模型是在大规模数据集上训练的先进人工智能系统，有可能为医学领域带来前所未有的进步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Advancing-computational-pathology-with-UNI-and-CONCH-foundation-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Advancing-computational-pathology-with-UNI-and-CONCH-foundation-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aadcc3f6-1ba2-4a94-ac4a-205182bc129c Tue, 19 Mar 2024 15:08:23 -0400 Advancing computational pathology with UNI and CONCH foundation models
放射学研究揭示了跨年龄段亲密伴侣暴力的模式亲密伴侣暴力 (IPV) 对女性和年轻人口的影响尤为严重，发生率在青春期和成年早期达到顶峰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Radiology-study-uncovers-patterns-of-intimate-partner-violence-across-age-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Radiology-study-uncovers-patterns-of-intimate-partner-violence-across-age-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0162757-b720-435b-aaad-2f22d3abb6c1 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 15:03:12 -0400 Radiology study uncovers patterns of intimate partner violence across age groups
审查表明中年大脑可以提供了解未来认知健康的窗口研究人员在 3 月 19 日发表在《神经科学趋势》杂志上的一篇评论中写道，中年大脑可以为了解未来认知健康提供一个窗口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Review-suggests-the-middle-ged-brain-could-provide-a-window-into-future-cognitive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Review-suggests-the-middle-ged-brain-could-provide-a-window-into-future-cognitive-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=664f379c-866d-4efe-aa86-24a8f29e515e Tue, 19 Mar 2024 14:48:27 -0400 Review suggests the middle-aged brain could provide a window into future cognitive health
